title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1588/95 of 30 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1588/95 of 30 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No  1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 is hereby replaced by the  Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
